value.title: Replace multiple values in Power Query in one step
value.excerpt: In todays video I will show you how to conditional replace values in one step without adding new columns in Power Query, Enjoy!!  Chapters: 00:00 Intro & Problem description 00:36 Replace values the normal way 01:37 The solution Done!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Transpose, pivot or unpivot in Power Query?
value.excerpt: In todays video I am going to show you what Transpose, pivot and unpivot is and examples on when to use each or all at once! value.title: A TWIST on dynamically filtering visuals by a slicer in Power BI
value.excerpt: Here's a twist on dynamically filtering visuals by a slicer in Power BI! You can't use a measure directly in a slicer, so here's a way to get a similar experience and maintain usability of your reports.  Scott Sewell: https://twitter.com/scottsewell  BI Elite Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AZAL-QPn5Zc

value.title: Best Practice Analyzer in Tabular Editor for your Power BI Dataset
value.excerpt: Do you work on your Power BI dataset or data model? Are you following best practices? value.title: Dynamic labels in Power BI using DAX
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick uses a little DAX, and the SelectedValue function, to get you some dynamic labels in your Power BI reports. value.title: Embed a dashboard from Power BI into your application

This uses a combination of the Power BI REST APIs and the JavaScript API.
